ubm:variation.name: hypercubeDimensionTargetRoleInvalidURI
ubm:variation.description: The value of the xbrldt:targetRole attribute is valid

ubm:variation.name: hasHypercubeContextElementInvalid
ubm:variation.description: The hasHypercube relationship has an invalid contextElement value. This should also be detected by XML schema tests, and may appear (after loading) as invalid if retained for end-user editing in some tools.

ubm:variation.name: hasHypercubeClosedInvalid
ubm:variation.description: The hasHypercube relationship has an invalid non-boolean closed attribute value. This may also be detected by XML schema tests.

ubm:variation.name: hasHypercubeTargetRoleInvalidURI
ubm:variation.description: An all hypercube has an msdos path in the targetRole attribute to locate the domain - dimension arc network.

ubm:variation.name: dimensionDomainTargetRoleInvalidURI
ubm:variation.description: A dimension-domain relationship has an msdos path in the targetRole attribute to locate the domain - member arc network.

ubm:variation.name: domainMemberTargetRoleInvalidURI
ubm:variation.description: A domain-member relationship has an msdos path in the targetRole attribute to locate the domain - member arc network.

ubm:variation.name: domainMemberUsableValid
ubm:variation.description: A domain-member relationship has a valid non-default usable attribute.

ubm:variation.name: domainMemberUsableInvalid
ubm:variation.description: A domain-member relationship has a bogus non-boolean usable attribute.
